content:
Craft an item of type: fletching_table
inventory=[{"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "lime_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 30, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 2, "index": 21}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 50, "index": 24}, {"type": "brick_wall", "quantity": 42, "index": 26}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 45, "index": 31}, {"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 34, "index": 38}, {"type": "granite_wall", "quantity": 41, "index": 40}, {"type": "enchanted_golden_apple", "quantity": 34, "index": 42}, {"type": "crimson_nylium", "quantity": 61, "index": 44}]

thought: I need to craft acacia_planks and then fletching_table. Acacia planks can be crafted using acacia_wood which is currently in slot 35. To do this, I will first need to move the acacia_wood to the crafting grid, so I will move it from slot 35 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: fletching_table
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "lime_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 30, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 2, "index": 21}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 50, "index": 24}, {"type": "brick_wall", "quantity": 42, "index": 26}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 45, "index": 31}, {"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 34, "index": 38}, {"type": "granite_wall", "quantity": 41, "index": 40}, {"type": "enchanted_golden_apple", "quantity": 34, "index": 42}, {"type": "crimson_nylium", "quantity": 61, "index": 44}]

thought: I have successfully crafted the acacia_planks, but I still need to craft the fletching_table. I will first need to move the acacia_planks from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11) so that I can use the crafting grid again.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: fletching_table
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "lime_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 30, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 2, "index": 21}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 50, "index": 24}, {"type": "brick_wall", "quantity": 42, "index": 26}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 45, "index": 31}, {"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 34, "index": 38}, {"type": "granite_wall", "quantity": 41, "index": 40}, {"type": "enchanted_golden_apple", "quantity": 34, "index": 42}, {"type": "crimson_nylium", "quantity": 61, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a fletching_table I need to place 2 flints in the top row of the crafting table and oak_planks below them. There is one flint in slot 21 and therefore I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: fletching_table
inventory=[{"type": "flint", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "lime_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 30, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 50, "index": 24}, {"type": "brick_wall", "quantity": 42, "index": 26}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 45, "index": 31}, {"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 34, "index": 38}, {"type": "granite_wall", "quantity": 41, "index": 40}, {"type": "enchanted_golden_apple", "quantity": 34, "index": 42}, {"type": "crimson_nylium", "quantity": 61, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that one flint is in slot 1, I need to place the other flint in slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 2 with quantity 1
